Docs.summary: This class allows developers to query and get two kinds of thumbnails: MINI_KIND: 512 x 384 thumbnail MICRO_KIND: 96 x 96 thumbnail

Docs.summary: This method cancels the thumbnail request so clients waiting for getThumbnail will be interrupted and return immediately.

Docs.param: the same groupId used in getThumbnail.

.method public static hidebysig class Android.Graphics.Bitmap GetThumbnail(class Android.Content.ContentResolver cr, int64 imageId, valuetype Android.Provider.ThumbnailKind kind, class Android.Graphics.BitmapFactory/Options options) cil managed
static member GetThumbnail : Android.Content.ContentResolver * int64 * Android.Provider.ThumbnailKind * Android.Graphics.BitmapFactory.Options -> Android.Graphics.Bitmap

Docs.param: ContentResolver used to dispatch queries to MediaProvider.
The type of thumbnail to fetch. Should be either MINI_KIND or MICRO_KIND.
this is only used for MINI_KIND when decoding the Bitmap
Docs.summary: This method checks if the thumbnails of the specified image (origId) has been created.

Docs.param: ContentResolver used to dispatch queries to MediaProvider.
the id of group to which this request belongs
The type of thumbnail to fetch. Should be either MINI_KIND or MICRO_KIND.
this is only used for MINI_KIND when decoding the Bitmap
Docs.summary: This method checks if the thumbnails of the specified image (origId) has been created.
